text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly states under section 2, 'Financial Penalties', that if the landlord's claim was frivolous or vexatious, the court may order them to 'pay your legal costs,' which directly addresses the general rule under English civil procedure that the losing party typically pays the successful party's costs.", "criterion_id": "b7d2016e-4746-4c0c-86d6-6ec12ee1ef2e"}
